mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into wmk_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg) values (wmk_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes}, #{gdsImg})
mapper.select: select gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate from wmk_goods order by gdsNum desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartNum, userId, gdsNum, gdsColor, gdsSize, gdsText, cartStock) values (tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{gdsColor}, #{gdsSize}, #{gdsText}, #{cartStock})
